title: Library Management System
description: Built a full-stack web application to manage library operations including book inventory, member roles, and issuing records. • Enables librarians to add, update, and delete book records and manage staff roles (admin, librarian, member). • Allows users to search for available books, request issues, and view return deadlines. • Implements access control, fine calculation, and transaction history for seamless library tracking.

title: TokenXtract – Blockchain-Based Government Fund Distribution System
description: Designed and developed a decentralized application to ensure transparent and secure fund transfer from ministries to verified contractors using blockchain technology.• Implemented a stage-wise token disbursement model (30-30-40%) based on work proof and approval by auditors and government authorities. • Utilized MetaMask for wallet integration and developed smart contracts in Solidity.  • Deployed and tested the system using Hardhat and the Polygon Amoy TestNet.

title: Job Portal – Job Listing and Application Platform
description: Developed a web-based platform that connects job seekers with employers through a seamless job listing and application workflow. • Enables employers to post jobs and manage listings across various industries. • Allows job seekers to search, filter, and apply to relevant job opportunities. • Designed with a responsive UI and secure application handling for an improved user experience.

title: Food Ordering site
description: Developed a web-based platform that connects customers with resturant through a seamless application workflow. • Enables customer to search through menu and order the item.  • Allows admin to see orders and process billing. • customers can track order and see bills

title: Number conversion
description: Allow user to convert number form one data type to another (eq. integer to binary)

title: Bubble game
description: Hit the number and count the score
